Articles.Content:
Crash log: http://pastebin.com/juugxgHr

I started a new game and began launching a constellation of commsats. I successfully got two up, but I can't get any more up because the game keeps crashing. 

How it normally goes down: Good launch, good first stage separation, then after maybe a minute or two of burning the upper stage, I get a CTD. 

I searched around and I couldn't find anyone else with this problem in 1.1 for people that are using 64 bit. 

I have lots and lots of mods

Thanks in advance
It doesn't do it anymore. One mod recently updated (I don't remember which one) and after that the CTDs stopped.
